attributes.action: Accept 2016's question was MISLEADING and BIASED as that invalidates any result
attributes.additional_details: Leaving without a valid mandate and denying 1.4 million~ voters now age 18 their say is not UK democracy as it disregards the views of TODAYS-MAJORITY.UK Democracy must be dynamic or it ceases to be democracy as facts emerge as they have. Leaving would be temporary due to Leave and Remain voter's age profiles so not worth suffering x years of adversity. Signatories: If government refuse to act, keep finding signatories because the more that sign it, the more likely MP's are to do what we ask.
attributes.background: It also did not mention leaving the Single Market and Customs Union so cannot be a mandate to do so. Leave's campaign lies, promise to implement, the subterfuge, the undisclosed consequences, mean it has all been contrived. The AUTHOR will explain more as this is just the gist of the justification.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about Brexit, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270385
